title: Raiders
desc:
Do you want to get shot?
- If everybody agrees not to get shot, nobody gets shot.
- If everybody votes yes, everybody gets shot, which means 3 HP's worth of unblockable damage.
- However, if even a single person votes 'yes', every 'no' voter gets shot.
- Non-voters get shot no matter what, without affecting the other results.

You have the rest of the round to answer. The final results will be announced publicly, but voters and vote counts will be hidden.
